ti:work.ti:title: De Se Ipsum Citra Invidiam Laudando

ti:translation.ti:label: How a Man May Inoffensively Praise Himself Without Being Liable to Envy
ti:translation.ti:description: Plutarch. Plutarch's Morals, Vol. II. Goodwin, William W., editor; Lancaster, P., translator. Boston: Little, Brown, and Company. Cambridge. 1874.

ti:edition.ti:label: Περὶ τοῦ ἑαυτὸν ἐπαινεῖν ἀνεπιφθόνως
ti:edition.ti:description: Plutarch. Plutarchi Chaeronensis Moralia, Vol. IΙI. Vernardakēs, Grēgorios N., editor. Leipzig: Teubner. 1891.
